div.head: 手足厥逆
div.div: recession with counterflow in the hands and legs

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: recession with counterflow in the hands and legs

sense.def: Alternative Names shou zu jue leng 手足厥冷 , recession with cold in the hands and legs; 手足冷 shou zu leng , the hands and legs are cold; shou zu ni leng 手足逆冷 , counterflow with cold in the hands and legs; shou zu han 手足寒 , the hands and feet are cold; shou zu jue han 手足厥寒 , recession with cold in the hands and legs. Illness Sign of hands and legs that feel as cold as ice when touched. Shang han lun 傷寒論 317: 手足厥逆， 脈微欲絕 , “ Recession with counterflow in the hands and legs . The [movement in the] vessels is weak and at the brink of interruption”.
